translated: Verses of the Elder Nuns .🔽The Group of Dukanipāta
I’m so well freed from the pestle!
I’m shameless, and my umbrella is opened,
And my winnowing basket blows in the wind.
I blow out passion and hatred,
Cicciṭi cicciṭi, I blow them out!
Having gone to the foot of a tree,
I meditate happily, thinking, ‘Ah, happiness!’”🔽… the elder nun Sumaṅgalamātā …
